text: Okay, little boy's on a stool that he looks like he's going to fall. Going to the cookie jar and the stool looks like it's going to fall over because it's like bending and the little girl is pointing and he's handing her a cookie. And mom is drying the dishes and all the water is coming out of the sink overflowing. And she's not paying attention to that. looking straight instead of looking at what you're doing.
